Realty network was designed to connect the finest independent real estate companies to the most prestigious clientele in the world. Sotheby's International Realty Affiliates LLC is a subsidiary of Anywhere Real Estate Inc. (NYSE: HOUS), a global leader in real estate franchising and provider of real estate brokerage, relocation and settlement services. In February 2004, Realogy entered into a long-term strategic alliance with Sotheby's, the operator of the auction house. The agreement provided for the licensing of the Sotheby's International Realty name and the development of a full franchise system. Affiliations in the system are granted only to brokerages and individuals meeting strict qualifications. Sotheby's International Realty Affiliates LLC supports its affiliates with a host of operational, marketing, recruiting, educational and business development resources. Venice to Pasadena and everywhere in between, Shelley Aaronson has helped clients buy and sell homes across a wide range of price points. With nearly 20 years in the industry, she brings a powerful combination of market expertise, an extensive network, and a background in arts and design. Her client-focused commitment has earned her an excellent reputation, reflected in a strong referral base and repeat clients—a true testament to the genuine care and skill she brings to every transaction. \u003c/p\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\u003cp\u003eShelley takes the time to really understand each client's unique needs, whether they are first-time buyers or seasoned investors. She offers a highly personalized approach, guiding with patience, strategy, and insight. Clients always have her by their side at each step and direct one-on-one communication, ensuring her full attention and unwavering advocacy at every stage. \u003c/p\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\u003cp\u003eA skilled negotiator, Shelley has an exceptional track record of her buyers prevailing in competitive, multiple-offer situations. For sellers, her tailored listing preparation, marketing, strategic outreach, and being a behind the scenes powerhouse, consistently drive top-dollar results. And when challenges arise, she's known for navigating obstacles with creative problem-solving and a steady hand. \u003c/p\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\u003cp\u003eHaving personally lived in diverse areas from the beach to the Eastside, Shelley has a deep understanding of the city's many neighborhoods and what makes each unique. Beyond actively previewing properties across LA to keep a pulse on the ever-evolving real estate landscape, she loves discovering new, winding streets and hidden pockets—because in LA, the search never ends. \u003c/p\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\u003cp\u003eWhether uncovering hidden opportunities, negotiating with tactical precision, or positioning a property for optimal success, Shelley consistently My experience allows me to handle any and all of the challenges that may arise. has been a licensed Realtor and multi-million dollar producer since 2003. Jenna is a second generation Realtor with a family history in both commercial and residential real estate. From the very beginning, building genuine client relationships has been a career foundation for Jenna. An educated yet caring approach to all areas of client representation is high on her list of accolades. Professionally facilitating real estate transactions with focus, attention to detail and client well-being is a standard of every day practice for Jenna. It should come at no surprise that the majority of her business is by personal referral and word-of-mouth.\u003cBR/\u003e\u003cBR/\u003eWith a passion for advanced education, Jenna specializes in contractual law and advanced client representation. She currently has the ABR (Accredited Buyer Representative) and SRS (Seller Representative Specialist) designations with more soon to come. Her constant drive for continued education at a young age brought multiple teaching opportunities with one of the top training firms in CT and at the national level with the National Association of Realtors (NAR). Jenna co-taught several advanced agent designations at the national NAR conventions and throughout New England where she developed and cultivated contacts throughout the country and Canada. It is because of these relationships that she has a high referral network to help relocate clients moving out of state.\u003cBR/\u003e\u003cBR/\u003eJenna has a passion far beyond real estate transactions. A love of architecture, high-end renovations, interior design, landscape and garden design are often integrated in her agency relationships. She has personally renovated two homes with many projects being either tear downs or seamlessly incorporating new build projects with existing homes. Simply put, Jenna helps her clients see what they can't. Whether it's a seller in need of input for minor renovations, paint color selections, light fixtures, staging and d\u0026#233;cor or a buyer that cannot see through needed repairs and neutralizing renovation fears.\u003cBR/\u003e\u003cBR/\u003eJenna has also always had a serious interest in law and medicine. This is how she became specialized in real estate contract law. She then completed a phlebotomy and surgical technology program to satisfy her medical curiosity. Jenna successfully completed all required surgical hours and rotations in the operating room to assist surgeons with her favorite specialties being anesthesiology, cardiothoracic and neuro surgery. \u003cBR/\u003e\u003cBR/\u003eJenna enjoys giving back to her community. She donates her time and money to decorating her son's school for all seasons and holidays. She does elaborate exterior d\u0026#233;cor, music and lighting for her neighborhood's annual Halloween Parade. She donates to the CT Humane Society to help shelter animals receive food, medical care and housing. For Christmas, she sponsors a large family each year in need of food, clothing, toys and toiletries. In addition, she donates to various charitable foundations to help women and children recovering from domestic violence receive food, housing, clothing and counseling.\u003cBR/\u003e\u003cBR/\u003eWhen not working or designing a home renovation, Jenna spends her time traveling the world with her husband and son. With a family business in aerospace manufacturing for over 70 years, Jenna has an appreciation for both private and commercial flying and travels whenever possible. Design and landscape innovation often come from time away, visiting other countries and gaining a new perspective. Jenna uses this time wisely and always brings home a wealth of new ideas and appreciation for life.\u003cBR/\u003e\u003cBR/\u003eNavigating through a real estate transaction can be overwhelming. Jenna provides a consistent, balanced presence as a neutral, non-emotional client advocate. As a busy parent herself, Jenna understands the importance of saving you time and money by stream-lining the buying and selling process to best suit your needs with the utmost care and attention. Jenna believes in luxury service at every price point for a well curated experience. Your luxury home is waiting for you!\u003cBR/\u003e\u003cBR/\u003e"},"phones":{"phone":[{"_attributes":{"name":"mobile","decrypted":"+1 most of us, buying or selling a property is the largest financial transaction of our lives and having the best agent representative can make all the difference. Sophie is very honored that her years of success in real estate have been recognized by her appointment as Senior Vice President of Sales at Sotheby’s International Realty Canada. Sophie Abbasi is a seasoned real estate professional with over 22 years of experience. She holds an MBA in finance, which gives her an added edge in understanding the financial aspects of real estate transactions. Her proven track record of success is evident in her position as one of the top-performing realtors at Sotheby's, with one of the highest sales among all agents Canada-wide.. She possesses the knowledge, skills, and expertise to guide you through every step of the buying or selling process. Her clients trust her with their most valuable assets due to her exceptional customer service, attention to detail, and ability to consistently exceed expectations. She is also very popular among her clients for providing mortgage services at unbeatable rates and is known for her exceptional ability to secure low mortgage rates for clients resulting in significant savings on the transaction. With her experience and vision, Sophie is able to navigate the ever-changing real estate market to deliver results for her clients. Returning customers are the hallmark of any successful business and Sophie enjoys a large following of repeat clients who won’t trust their real estate needs to anyone else. Whether you're a first-time home buyer or a seasoned investor, Sophie is dedicated to helping you achieve your real estate goals.'"},"phones":{"phone":[{"_attributes":{"name":"mobile","decrypted":"416.509.4989","encrypted":"8Up1gHJuTksJmWNMwctqNw6l3I5ln8KYFSPP7MRGYqg="}},{"_attributes":{"name":"primary","decrypted":"905.845.0024","encrypted":"A1NrqZP+nQXReR1LpJlIJEneUZvp/0+WxuOKg4tL7DQ="}}]},"coverageareas":{"area":[{"_attributes":{"seo":"oakville-on-can"},"address":{"addrcity":{"_text":"Oakville"},"addrstate":{"_text":"Ontario"},"template":{"_text":"{City}{, With a focus on meeting diverse client needs, Kim offers comprehensive support for first-time buyers, those seeking larger homes, downsizers and buyers interested in renovation opportunities. \u003cbr /\u003e\u003cbr /\u003eAfter earning a degree in merchandising and marketing from the University of Georgia, Kim spent over a decade developing business-to-business marketing strategies for various Atlanta-based technology companies that deliver data-driven customer experience solutions to Fortune 500 companies. However, she always knew real estate was where she wanted to be, and after pivoting her career in 2016, she quickly proved herself a natural in the industry. Kim closed 2021 with a record-breaking career-high and based on volume sales, ranked among the Top 5% of all Atlanta REALTORS\u0026#174; Association members. \u003cbr /\u003e\u003cbr /\u003eOver the years, Kim has witnessed firsthand the incredible transformation of the Atlanta metro area and is proud to live and work in a city that, through all of its changes and growth, continues to invest in its communities. Erramouspe Abbey, CRS, GRI, RSPS, ASP-RE, IAHSP-SSS\u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003e \u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003eA fourth-generation New Mexican of French-Basque descent, Lorin was raised amid the red rocks, open plains, and majestic mountains of New Mexico and grew up immersed in the ranch lifestyle. Her Basque grandparents owned one of the largest sheep and cattle ranches in the state, and her father was an all-round rodeo champion, rancher, cattle broker, and horse racing aficionado. A graduate of the University of New Mexico with concentrations in dance, developmental psychology, and special education, she now lives a rich, meaningful life in Santa Fe.\u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003eA Realtor for more than 15 years, Lorin is a consummate professional. She was named the Santa Fe Association of Realtors 2006 Rookie of the Year and is a former member of the association’s board of directors. She is a Certified Residential Specialist, a Resort and Second Homes Specialist Accredited Staging Professional, an International Association of Home Staging Professionals Senior Staging Specialist and has achieved numerous other designations and accomplishments.\u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003eLorin values learning, continually pursues personal and professional excellence, and strives to remain a trusted expert and successful partner in all aspects of the business. Experienced buyers and sellers recognize her as one of the area’s most conscientious and detail-oriented brokers. Bill Richardson as State Arts Director, coaches high school dance teams, is Pilates certified, and enjoys movement of all kinds—including local Jazzercise classes taught by her daughter Audra.\u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003eWhen not spending time with their Great Pyrenees pups, Lorin and her husband, David, enjoy traveling throughout New Mexico and beyond. 1984 Camille Abbott has built her real estate business giving back to the community in which she lives as well as to the clients she serves. Many are repeat customers because they know they can count on Camille for the real estate knowledge needed to help them achieve their real estate goals whether they are a buyer or seller. A great number of those people are referrals from clients who know and trust her. They entrust a dear friend or family member or co-worker to her knowing that she will do what it takes to achieve their real estate goals. Camille takes those referrals very seriously and prides herself on meeting the clients' expectations and more. Whether dealing with CEOs of companies, powerful attorneys, entertainers, or friends and family, luxury real estate or investment property, Camille knows that a real estate transaction is emotional and stressful. She relieves that stress and takes the steps to make the purchase or sale happen. Camille is the party in the transaction who helps her client make sound, educated, decisions based on reliable information and experience, and that keeps her clients not only coming back but sending others. In short, she is a problem solver and a skilled listener. She takes great pride in knowing that she has served her client well. To Camille, being a Realtor is more than just a sign in the yard and having access to the MLS. It is being a trusted advisor. Fueled by tremendous support from her family and friends, she left a career in theatre arts education at the secondary school level and built a successful real estate business working for the best firms in the city. She experienced Austin when it was a university town and state capital, and now she is proud to call the Live Music Capital of the World her home. Over the years, she has served The Paramount Theatre, Rodeo Austin, ZACH Theatre, Central Texas Girls Scouts as committee chair, board member, and volunteer. She is a graduate of Leadership Austin. It is her hope to leave a legacy for all Austinites. Camille is an advocate for animals who cannot speak for themselves through Austin Pets Alive and the ASPCA. She currently serves on the board of the American Cutting Horse Association. Camille is a respected Realtor in the city of Austin who is known for her enthusiasm, compassion, real estate knowledge and her positive energy. The belief that education is power has kept Camille continuing her education and has earned her numerous prestigious professional designations. Though thinking she would always make her way to the Broadway stage and maybe even a Tony award, she now proudly says, “I am a Realtor.” She is definitely not the same old song and dance."},"phones":{"phone":[{"_attributes":{"name":"primary","decrypted":"+1 512.529.1299","encrypted":"pIzUd7t1cEP2Bt4ub4ytuy5V1yk0xgq2TueDYInSZxw="}},{"_attributes":{"name":"broker","decrypted":"+1 Abbott's family first discovered the Gulf Coast in the early 1950s and have lived here ever since. At that time, his grandfather, William W. Abbott Sr., was an Air Force major OSI and initially purchased waterfront property in Fort Walton Beach to raise his family there after retiring. In 1970, Chris' grandfather became a real estate broker, beginning his career selling condominiums in the El Matador development on Okaloosa Island. This was one of the first residential condominium properties built in northwest Florida. Soon, the Abbott name became synonymous with real estate along the Gulf Coast when Chris' father, William W. Abbott Jr., and uncle, Stephen J. Abbott, joined the family business, founding Abbott Realty Services in 1977. With personalized customer service and an unsurpassed work ethic, they built a company employing more than 1,000 people and became the largest employer in Destin since the mid-1980s. Chris was raised in the family business and enjoyed his childhood on the Gulf Coast. After playing baseball in Tallahassee and graduating from Florida State University with a degree in business management, he pursued a career in yacht sales, as life on the water has always been a personal passion. The yacht sale industry helped hone his sales skills, so the transition to real estate sales in 2004 was a natural one. He is the third generation of Abbott real estate experts in this area, and although times have changed, the founding principles that guide him are tried and true: customer service, knowledge, hard work and dedication. Today, Chris is the co-owner and managing broker of Scenic Sotheby's International Realty and looks forward to assisting you with your real estate With sharp attention to detail and a determined approach, Elin is committed to ensuring a smooth and successful home buying or selling experience. Her creative eye, honed from years of running her own fine art photography business, allows her to bring a unique and personalized touch to every transaction. Elin’s love for the country and animals makes her especially adept at helping clients find acreage and rural properties to build their dream home. She originally started her real estate career as a land developer assistant, gaining valuable insights into the nuances of buying and selling expansive properties. Her local market knowledge, combined with her passion for helping others, makes Elin an invaluable partner in finding the perfect home or securing the best deal for her clients. Her warm and engaging personality ensures that clients feel comfortable and confident throughout the entire process. Originally from Fort Worth, Elin now calls Willow Park home, where she lives with her husband, Chad, their daughter, Kolli Jane, and their two beloved dogs, Hondo and Grover. life and have been in the real estate business for over 20 years. I have sold homes from less than $400,000 to $5,000,000 and more, and everywhere in between. Regardless of the price point, my priority remains the same: To provide my clients with thorough customer service throughout the entire process of buying or selling a home. I am vested in every aspect of each transaction as if it were my own. My work begins as I get to know my clients and their particular needs, and my job isn't finished until the final closing details are complete. My experience allows me to handle any and all of the challenges that may arise. I have developed a wide array of professional contacts (real estate attorneys, mortgage bankers, building inspectors, and contractors) to work with my clients whenever needed.\u003cBR/\u003e\u003cBR/\u003eI have spent time in 'Corporate America' and have raised my family. I know the many facets and challenges of relocation. With my knowledge of and background in Fairfield County, I am ready and able to help my clients and their families with the transition into the area. I am there for my clients long after a sale is complete.\u003cBR/\u003e\u003cBR/\u003eThe real estate market never stands still. It's always changing. Buyers' \u0026amp; Sellers' markets, price fluctuations, rising and falling interest rates: I've seen and worked through them all. None of that affects my effort and the standard of excellence I insist upon. No matter the situation, I always bring a fair, honest, hardworking approach to what I do.\u003cBR/\u003e\u003cBR/\u003eOver the years, I have received many industry awards and accolades, and I am honored \u0026amp; grateful for the recognition. has been a licensed Realtor and multi-million dollar producer since 2003. Jenna is a second generation Realtor with a family history in both commercial and residential real estate. From the very beginning, building genuine client relationships has been a career foundation for Jenna. An educated yet caring approach to all areas of client representation is high on her list of accolades. Professionally facilitating real estate transactions with focus, attention to detail and client well-being is a standard of every day practice for Jenna. It should come at no surprise that the majority of her business is by personal referral and word-of-mouth.\u003cBR/\u003e\u003cBR/\u003eWith a passion for advanced education, Jenna specializes in contractual law and advanced client representation. She currently has the ABR (Accredited Buyer Representative) and SRS (Seller Representative Specialist) designations with more soon to come. Her constant drive for continued education at a young age brought multiple teaching opportunities with one of the top training firms in CT and at the national level with the National Association of Realtors (NAR). Jenna co-taught several advanced agent designations at the national NAR conventions and throughout New England where she developed and cultivated contacts throughout the country and Canada. It is because of these relationships that she has a high referral network to help relocate clients moving out of state.\u003cBR/\u003e\u003cBR/\u003eJenna has a passion far beyond real estate transactions. A love of architecture, high-end renovations, interior design, landscape and garden design are often integrated in her agency relationships. She has personally renovated two homes with many projects being either tear downs or seamlessly incorporating new build projects with existing homes. Simply put, Jenna helps her clients see what they can't. Whether it's a seller in need of input for minor renovations, paint color selections, light fixtures, staging and d\u0026#233;cor or a buyer that cannot see through needed repairs and neutralizing renovation fears.\u003cBR/\u003e\u003cBR/\u003eJenna has also always had a serious interest in law and medicine. This is how she became specialized in real estate contract law. She then completed a phlebotomy and surgical technology program to satisfy her medical curiosity. Jenna successfully completed all required surgical hours and rotations in the operating room to assist surgeons with her favorite specialties being anesthesiology, cardiothoracic and neuro surgery. \u003cBR/\u003e\u003cBR/\u003eJenna enjoys giving back to her community. She donates her time and money to decorating her son's school for all seasons and holidays. She does elaborate exterior d\u0026#233;cor, music and lighting for her neighborhood's annual Halloween Parade. She donates to the CT Humane Society to help shelter animals receive food, medical care and housing. For Christmas, she sponsors a large family each year in need of food, clothing, toys and toiletries. In addition, she donates to various charitable foundations to help women and children recovering from domestic violence receive food, housing, clothing and counseling.\u003cBR/\u003e\u003cBR/\u003eWhen not working or designing a home renovation, Jenna spends her time traveling the world with her husband and son. With a family business in aerospace manufacturing for over 70 years, Jenna has an appreciation for both private and commercial flying and travels whenever possible. Design and landscape innovation often come from time away, visiting other countries and gaining a new perspective. Jenna uses this time wisely and always brings home a wealth of new ideas and appreciation for life.\u003cBR/\u003e\u003cBR/\u003eNavigating through a real estate transaction can be overwhelming. Jenna provides a consistent, balanced presence as a neutral, non-emotional client advocate. As a busy parent herself, Jenna understands the importance of saving you time and money by stream-lining the buying and selling process to best suit your needs with the utmost care and attention. Jenna believes in luxury service at every price point for a well curated experience. Your luxury home is waiting for you!\u003cBR/\u003e\u003cBR/\u003e"},"phones":{"phone":[{"_attributes":{"name":"mobile","decrypted":"+1 With a focus on meeting diverse client needs, Kim offers comprehensive support for first-time buyers, those seeking larger homes, downsizers and buyers interested in renovation opportunities. \u003cbr /\u003e\u003cbr /\u003eAfter earning a degree in merchandising and marketing from the University of Georgia, Kim spent over a decade developing business-to-business marketing strategies for various Atlanta-based technology companies that deliver data-driven customer experience solutions to Fortune 500 companies. Erramouspe Abbey, CRS, GRI, RSPS, ASP-RE, IAHSP-SSS\u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003e \u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003eA fourth-generation New Mexican of French-Basque descent, Lorin was raised amid the red rocks, open plains, and majestic mountains of New Mexico and grew up immersed in the ranch lifestyle. Her Basque grandparents owned one of the largest sheep and cattle ranches in the state, and her father was an all-round rodeo champion, rancher, cattle broker, and horse racing aficionado. A graduate of the University of New Mexico with concentrations in dance, developmental psychology, and special education, she now lives a rich, meaningful life in Santa Fe.\u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003eA Realtor for more than 15 years, Lorin is a consummate professional. She was named the Santa Fe Association of Realtors 2006 Rookie of the Year and is a former member of the association’s board of directors. She is a Certified Residential Specialist, a Resort and Second Homes Specialist Accredited Staging Professional, an International Association of Home Staging Professionals Senior Staging Specialist and has achieved numerous other designations and accomplishments.\u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003eLorin values learning, continually pursues personal and professional excellence, and strives to remain a trusted expert and successful partner in all aspects of the business. Experienced buyers and sellers recognize her as one of the area’s most conscientious and detail-oriented brokers. She offers outstanding service with heartfelt intentions—and always with a smile.\u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003eBeyond real estate sales and consulting, Lorin has held numerous positions in the arts, philanthropy, early childhood education, senior living, development, and governmental affairs. She supports the Food Depot, the School for Advanced Research, and the New Mexico School of the Arts, where her granddaughter is a student. She supports numerous museums and historic sites and currently serves as a Trustee for the Museum of New Mexico Foundation. A founding member of UNM’s Friends of Dance, Lorin was appointed by Gov. Bill Richardson as State Arts Director, coaches high school dance teams, is Pilates certified, and enjoys movement of all kinds—including local Jazzercise classes taught by her daughter Audra.\u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003eWhen not spending time with their Great Pyrenees pups, Lorin and her husband, David, enjoy traveling throughout New Mexico and beyond. Lorin is honored to be a part of Sotheby’s International Realty and a vital part of Blagden Realty Group. She looks forward to working with you and your family, colleagues, and friends.\u003c/p\u003e"},"phones":{"phone":[{"_attributes":{"name":"mobile","decrypted":"+1 1984 Camille Abbott has built her real estate business giving back to the community in which she lives as well as to the clients she serves. Many are repeat customers because they know they can count on Camille for the real estate knowledge needed to help them achieve their real estate goals whether they are a buyer or seller. A great number of those people are referrals from clients who know and trust her. They entrust a dear friend or family member or co-worker to her knowing that she will do what it takes to achieve their real estate goals. Camille takes those referrals very seriously and prides herself on meeting the clients' expectations and more. Whether dealing with CEOs of companies, powerful attorneys, entertainers, or friends and family, luxury real estate or investment property, Camille knows that a real estate transaction is emotional and stressful. She relieves that stress and takes the steps to make the purchase or sale happen. Camille is the party in the transaction who helps her client make sound, educated, decisions based on reliable information and experience, and that keeps her clients not only coming back but sending others. In short, she is a problem solver and a skilled listener. She takes great pride in knowing that she has served her client well. To Camille, being a Realtor is more than just a sign in the yard and having access to the MLS. It is being a trusted advisor. Fueled by tremendous support from her family and friends, she left a career in theatre arts education at the secondary school level and built a successful real estate business working for the best firms in the city. She experienced Austin when it was a university town and state capital, and now she is proud to call the Live Music Capital of the World her home. Over the years, she has served The Paramount Theatre, Rodeo Austin, ZACH Theatre, Central Texas Girls Scouts as committee chair, board member, and volunteer. She is a graduate of Leadership Austin. It is her hope to leave a legacy for all Austinites. Camille is an advocate for animals who cannot speak for themselves through Austin Pets Alive and the ASPCA. She currently serves on the board of the American Cutting Horse Association. Camille is a respected Realtor in the city of Austin who is known for her enthusiasm, compassion, real estate knowledge and her positive energy. The belief that education is power has kept Camille continuing her education and has earned her numerous prestigious professional designations. Though thinking she would always make her way to the Broadway stage and maybe even a Tony award, she now proudly says, “I am a Realtor.” She is definitely not the same old song and dance."},"phones":{"phone":[{"_attributes":{"name":"primary","decrypted":"+1 512.529.1299","encrypted":"pIzUd7t1cEP2Bt4ub4ytuy5V1yk0xgq2TueDYInSZxw="}},{"_attributes":{"name":"broker","decrypted":"+1 Abbott's family first discovered the Gulf Coast in the early 1950s and have lived here ever since. At that time, his grandfather, William W. Abbott Sr., was an Air Force major OSI and initially purchased waterfront property in Fort Walton Beach to raise his family there after retiring. In 1970, Chris' grandfather became a real estate broker, beginning his career selling condominiums in the El Matador development on Okaloosa Island. This was one of the first residential condominium properties built in northwest Florida. Soon, the Abbott name became synonymous with real estate along the Gulf Coast when Chris' father, William W. Abbott Jr., and uncle, Stephen J. Abbott, joined the family business, founding Abbott Realty Services in 1977. With personalized customer service and an unsurpassed work ethic, they built a company employing more than 1,000 people and became the largest employer in Destin since the mid-1980s. Chris was raised in the family business and enjoyed his childhood on the Gulf Coast. After playing baseball in Tallahassee and graduating from Florida State University with a degree in business management, he pursued a career in yacht sales, as life on the water has always been a personal passion. The yacht sale industry helped hone his sales skills, so the transition to real estate sales in 2004 was a natural one. He is the third generation of Abbott real estate experts in this area, and although times have changed, the founding principles that guide him are tried and true: customer service, knowledge, hard work and dedication. Today, Chris is the co-owner and managing broker of Scenic Sotheby's International Realty and looks forward to assisting you with your real estate  class=\"footer-aboutcontainer  u-doublepadding-top  u-doublepadding-bottom\"\u003e\n\u003ch2 class=\"h3 u-halfpadding-top  u-color-primary--color\"\u003eAbout Sotheby's International Realty Affiliates LLC\u003c/h2\u003e\n\u003cp class=\"u-text-size-xs  u-padding-top  u-padding-bottom\"\u003eFounded in 1976 to provide independent brokerages with a powerful marketing and referral program for luxury listings, the \u003cem\u003eSotheby's International Realty\u003c/em\u003e network was designed to connect the finest independent real estate companies to the most prestigious clientele in the world. Sotheby's International Realty Affiliates LLC is a subsidiary of Realogy Holdings Corp. (NYSE: RLGY), a global leader in real estate franchising and provider of real estate brokerage, relocation and settlement services. In February 2004, Realogy entered into a long-term strategic alliance with Sotheby's, the operator of the auction house. The agreement provided for the licensing of the \u003cem\u003eSotheby's International Realty\u003c/em\u003e name and the development of a full franchise system. Affiliations in the system are granted only to brokerages and individuals meeting strict qualifications. Sotheby's International Realty Affiliates LLC supports its affiliates with a host of operational, marketing, recruiting, educational and business development resources. sir affiliates text":"Founded in 1976 to provide independent brokerages with a powerful marketing and referral program for luxury listings, the Sotheby's International Realty network was designed to connect the finest independent real estate companies to the most prestigious clientele in the world. Sotheby's International Realty Affiliates LLC is a subsidiary of Anywhere Real Estate Inc. (NYSE: HOUS), a global leader in real estate franchising and provider of real estate brokerage, relocation and settlement services. In February 2004, Realogy entered into a long-term strategic alliance with Sotheby's, the operator of the auction house. The agreement provided for the licensing of the Sotheby's International Realty name and the development of a full franchise system. Affiliations in the system are granted only to brokerages and individuals meeting strict qualifications. Sotheby's International Realty Affiliates LLC supports its affiliates with a host of operational, marketing, recruiting, educational and business development resources. Franchise affiliates also benefit from an association with the venerable Sotheby's auction house, established in 1744.","global:Did You Mean To Search For":"Did You Mean To Search
